item.description:
This event is for advanced speakers.

The number of seats is very limited because the cafe is very popular and also to keep our group more intimate. 

Learn who else went last time and discover what everybodies saying.

Five stars and lot's and lot's of people: 

http://www.meetup.com/bostonspanish/events/16475347/

 

thank you for clicking and see you there!

Josh
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing next to the door, wearing my Red Sox hat and surrounded by the HUGE group of Spanish speakers. ;)
item.why: ““We will be meeting new Spanish speakers and practicing our Spanish. This celebration will be small because the cafe always fills up and to keep our group more small and intimate. There are always a lot of regulars and some new people. :)””

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Espanol en Brookline! Quien mas...
